title: Page Blocks

fields.label: Page Blocks
fields.name: sections
fields.instructions: You can design the layout of your page by adding different block types. Click the 'Add New Block' button below to get started.

sub_fields.label: Block Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to add a title to the block, you can do so here. You can enclose text in double square brackets [[ ]] to emphasise certain words. For example [[I am emphasised!]] I am not! Max 90 characters

sub_fields.label: Editor
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Please add your text here.

sub_fields.label: Buttons
sub_fields.name: buttons
sub_fields.instructions: You can add up to three Call to Action buttons to this block.

sub_fields.label: Background Colour
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions: Select the background colour you would like for this block.

sub_fields.label: Disable Block
sub_fields.name: disable
sub_fields.instructions: Prevents the block from showing on the front-end, whilst keeping all of the content saved in the back-end.

sub_fields.label: Display Options
sub_fields.name: display_options
sub_fields.instructions: Control whether this block is shown on smaller screens (by default blocks show on all screen sizes).

sub_fields.label: Block ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Add an optional HTML element ID to the block.

sub_fields.label: Schedule Block
sub_fields.message: If you'd like this block to only show at a certain time, you can schedule it here.

sub_fields.label: Show From
sub_fields.name: show_from
sub_fields.instructions: When would you like this block to show from?

sub_fields.label: Show Until
sub_fields.name: show_until
sub_fields.instructions: When would you like this block to show until?

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: Please add your text columns here. You can add between two and four columns to a block. Please be mindful of putting too much text in a column as you do not want your users to have to scroll up and down to read each column in turn.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Please add your text.

sub_fields.label: Position
sub_fields.name: media_position
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like the media to be on the left or right of the block?

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Please add your video.

sub_fields.label: Aspect Ratio
sub_fields.name: aspect_ratio
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the video's aspect ratio.

sub_fields.label: Image Source
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Please select your image.

sub_fields.label: Website Address
sub_fields.name: website_url
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter the web page URL

sub_fields.label: HTML
sub_fields.name: unfiltered_html
sub_fields.instructions: You can add HTML here and it will not be sanitized. E.g. you can paste

sub_fields.label: Vertical Alignment
sub_fields.name: vertical_align
sub_fields.instructions: How would you like the content in this row to be aligned vertically?

sub_fields.label: Column Split
sub_fields.name: column_split
sub_fields.instructions: How would you like the columns to be split? Applies to larger screen sizes only.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Please select your image.

sub_fields.label: Full Width?
sub_fields.name: full_width
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want the content to span the full-width of the page?

sub_fields.label: Images
sub_fields.name: images
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the images you'd like in the gallery.

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Please select your video.

sub_fields.label: Aspect Ratio
sub_fields.name: aspect_ratio
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the video's aspect ratio.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Add some text to this block. Max 280 characters.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a background image for this block. Minimum size 1920px wide x 1080px high

sub_fields.label: Parallax Background?
sub_fields.name: parallax_background
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to add a parallax scroll style to the background?

sub_fields.label: Overlay Colour
sub_fields.name: overlay_color
sub_fields.instructions: Add an optional color overlay

sub_fields.label: Preamble
sub_fields.name: preamble
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to add a preamble to this block, you can do so here.

sub_fields.label: Website Address
sub_fields.name: website_url
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter the web page URL

sub_fields.label: Preamble Clone
sub_fields.name: preamble_clone
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to add a preamble to this block, you can do so here.

sub_fields.label: Location
sub_fields.name: location_marker
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a location for the marker on this map.

sub_fields.label: Location Icon
sub_fields.name: location_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Add an optional image for the marker, if you want to override the default.

sub_fields.label: Tooltip Text
sub_fields.name: location_tooltip_text
sub_fields.instructions: Please add some optional text for this location's tooltip.

sub_fields.label: Display Address
sub_fields.name: display_address
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like to display the address information on the tooltip?

sub_fields.label: Preamble Clone
sub_fields.name: preamble_clone
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to add a preamble to this block, you can do so here.

sub_fields.label: HTML
sub_fields.name: unfiltered_html
sub_fields.instructions: You can add HTML here and it will not be sanitized. E.g. you can paste

sub_fields.label: Preamble Clone
sub_fields.name: preamble_clone
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to add a preamble to this block, you can do so here.

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: query_type
sub_fields.instructions: How would you like to determine the posts to show?

sub_fields.label: Posts
sub_fields.name: specified_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Please select all of the posts you would like to feature. Posts will display in the order added.

sub_fields.label: Post Type
sub_fields.name: query_post_type
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the post type you would like to display.

sub_fields.label: Quantity
sub_fields.name: query_quantity
sub_fields.instructions: How many posts would you like to show?

sub_fields.label: Preamble Clone
sub_fields.name: preamble_clone
sub_fields.instructions: If you'd like to add a preamble to this block, you can do so here.

sub_fields.label: Post Type
sub_fields.name: query_post_type
sub_fields.instructions: Please select the post type you would like to display.

sub_fields.label: Loading Type
sub_fields.name: loading_type
sub_fields.instructions: Would you like posts to appear on scroll or at the touch of a button?

fields.label: To speed up page creation, you can import blocks from another page or post on the website.
fields.message:
1) Check the toggle "Enable Import" to "Yes".
2) Using the select box, find the page or post you wish to import fields from.
3) Save/Publish the post.
4) When the post has been saved, you may need to refresh the editor to see the imported blocks.

description: This flexible content field group allows the editor to create dynamic layouts with ease using ACF flexible content blocks.
